				[1683] link 'Reviews (12)', url='http://127.0.0.1:7770/bushnell-743333-boresighter-with-case-arbors-black.html#reviews'
					StaticText '('
					StaticText '12'
					StaticText ')'
			[1685] tabpanel 'Reviews (12)'
				[2091] strong ''
					StaticText 'Customer Reviews'
				[2117] list ''
					[2118] listitem ''
						StaticText 'Easy to use, and works like a charm.'
						[2120] LayoutTable ''
							[2121] LayoutTableRow ''
								[2122] LayoutTableCell 'Rating'
									StaticText 'Rating'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '100%'
						StaticText 'I was kinda skeptical, and didn\'t know what to expect when I ordered this. But, boy, am I glad I did. I had a rifle that I had just put a new variable power scope on. It really needed to be bore sighted. I verified that the scope was level to the rifle, grabbed the correct insert, and put it in the sighting scope, and placed it in the barrel. Using a lead sled to keep the rifle steady, it\'s just a matter of putting the scope cross hairs on the center of the little target you see in the boresight. Easy. So, took the rifle out to zero it today. WOW! I am impressed. Dead on left to right, and only about 5 inches high. A few clicks, to adjust the height, and couple more rounds to verify, and it was dead on. The cost saving on "shooting around" to find the zero amazing. Total of 8 rounds fired and gun is dead on. I would recommend this tool.'
						[2133] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Review by'
							[2135] strong ''
								StaticText 'LL Dude'
						[2136] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Posted on'
							[2138] time ''
								StaticText '4/19/23'
					[2139] listitem ''
						StaticText 'Claims are very misleading!'
						[2141] LayoutTable ''
							[2142] LayoutTableRow ''
								[2143] LayoutTableCell 'Rating'
									StaticText 'Rating'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605\ue605'
								StaticText '20%'
						StaticText 'I set my rifle up using the Bushnell Professional Bore Sighter. Using a bench vice, the first shot did not put me on paper at 50 yards. I had a 20" x 20" target and missed by a mile. Luckily I hit the backstop. 8" low from center and to the right 18". Bushnell claims it will put sighting-in test shots "on the paper". I had similar results using different guns. I Would Not recommend this product.'

step_data.thought: The current page is displaying the second and final page of reviews for the Bushnell 743333 Boresighter. I have already scrolled down to read through all the reviews on this page. Since there are no more pages of reviews and I have already read through the existing ones, the next step is to summarize the information about the rating and reviews.
